snippet: Julian Schieber scored in the second half to lift host Borussia Dortmund over Manchester City in the Champions League, ending City’s chances of reaching the Europa League.
abstract: Borussia Dortmund beats Manchester City, 1-0, in soccer's Champions League.
lead_paragraph: Julian Schieber scored in the second half to lift host Borussia Dortmund over Manchester City in the Champions League, ending City’s chances of reaching the Europa League.
